name: Copycat Surviving
description:
Copycat Surviving is a game where if you die, you copy that enemy, assuming their form. Fend them off with your ghost gun that gets progressively stronger as it goes. Start each wave by pressing the spacebar!  You have to survive 20 rounds and defeat the boss to win!

- Controls -

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Ability

Spacebar - Next Wave

Escape, Backspace, or Enter - Pause

- Credits -

Game made by Steek Stook

Almost all assets used made by Steek Stook

The rest of the assets used gotten from Gdevelop Asset Store

Music and SFX made by Steek Stook

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1!
